General.Name: Argosy Research
General.Description: Argosy Research Inc. engages in the production and sale of electronic components and connectors, and system products in Asia, the United States, and internationally. Its products include DDR SO-DIMM and long DIMM socket, Type-C, PCIe and mini PCIe, M.2 / NGFF, LVDS, RF coaxial, and metal and stamping parts. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 15-3, Niupu South Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
